ValidationRule.description: Closing Comments must be filled out for all Closed Projects
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(pse__Stage__c), CONTAINS(TEXT(pse__Stage__c) , "Pending Closure"), NOT($Profile.Id='00e30000000bvR3'), NOT($Profile.Id='00e50000001BeRg'), NOT($User.Id='00550000001NiJb'), NOT($User.Id='00550000002ngng'), ISBLANK(Closing_Comments__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must fill out the Closing Comments text area before you can mark this Project as Closed.
